metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare powers the fastest, most immersive, and most reliable gaming experiences

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare for Gaming
relatedBlades.subtitle: Secure, accelerate, analyze, and build with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy:
Delivering excellent real-time experiences at scale to players around the world is a massive challenge. Solve it with Cloudflare — which helps power fast, immersive, and reliable online gaming experiences.

Secure and accelerate your game with Cloudflare's __100% uptime SLA__, __DDoS__ and __bot mitigation__, __traffic acceleration__, __bespoke serverless matchmaking architecture__, and more.

relatedBlades.quote: "Knowing that we don't have to worry about DDoS attacks against our API and gateway servers gives us the peace of mind to focus on improving our product."

quoteCarousel.quote: "We were looking at moving our data from one storage provider to another, and it was a total no-brainer to use a service that was part of the Bandwidth Alliance. It really makes sense for anyone looking at any cloud service, especially one that's pushing a lot of traffic."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: Co-founder & Chief Technology Officer of Nodecraft

quoteCarousel.quote: "We wanted to ensure we have a high-quality Cloudflare level of protection to protect our critical communication protocol, and Cloudflare helped us really boost the performance and resiliency of our custom TCP protocols. With other providers, it takes more than 30 seconds to a minute before scrubbing or mitigation takes place. Using Cloudflare, it's much faster."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: Chief Information Officer of Turtle Entertainment

quoteCarousel.quote: "Attacks that would otherwise make our site slow or entirely inaccessible get blocked by Cloudflare. Because of this protection, the 1,600 sites we have on Cloudflare are kept online and our community keeps coming back to enjoy them."

relatedBlades.description: Securing gaming and gambling companies against DDoS attacks

relatedBlades.title: Secure your game
relatedBlades.copy:
Gaming companies are often vulnerable to DDoS attacks. Game platforms that rely on custom TCP and UDP communication protocols require even more resources to prevent these attacks.

Protect the uptime, performance, and integrity of your game servers with Cloudflare.

image.description: Illustration of identities in front of a shield

features.title: Spectrum
features.description: Get DDoS protection for all your TCP/UDP applications. Give your custom game applications DDoS protection with fast performance.

features.title: DDoS Protection
features.description: Reduce the risk of lost customers, declining revenues, and degraded brand with better uptime and protection against Layer 7 DDoS attacks.

features.title: Bot Management
features.description: Prevent fraudulent account creation and preserve the integrity of your First Person Shooter (FPS) games with Bot Management.

features.title: Magic Transit
features.description: DDoS protection and traffic acceleration for on-premise, cloud-hosted, and hybrid networks — delivered from every Cloudflare data center.

features.title: API Shield
features.description: Keep your APIs secure and productive with API discovery, schema validation, strong authentication, and more.

features.title: Zero Trust
features.description: Give developers and contractors secure and streamlined access to internal systems.

relatedBlades.title: Cyber security best practices for online gaming and igaming companies

buttonOne.elementName: CTA - Cyber security best practices for online gaming and igaming companies

relatedBlades.title: Accelerate your game
relatedBlades.copy:
Players are likely to be globally distributed, and game servers geographically distant from players — which leads to slow downloads and high ping times. Players are quick to abandon a game if there is noticeable lag or if the game does not respond in real-time.

Cloudflare's globally distributed network spans %{DataCenterCount} cities, enabling proximity to players and delivering lightning-fast experiences.

features.title: Cloudflare CDN
features.description: Deliver online game downloads, software updates, and live video to any device — at scale, and with minimal latency — over Cloudflare's global network for a consistent and reliable gamer experience.

features.title: Argo Smart Routing
features.description: Use Cloudflare's incredible network intelligence and private backbone to deliver traffic to your gamers over the fastest Internet paths and avoid network congestion.

features.title: Stream
features.description: Ensure fast video delivery, with shorter video startup times and reduced buffering, no matter where your players are located.

relatedBlades.title: Analyze networks and gaming websites
relatedBlades.copy: You can't improve what you don't measure. Analyze logs from networks, applications, and security services to gain insights on how to improve security and performance for your players.

image.description: Illustration of charts and graphs on a laptop

features.title: Cloudflare Analytics
features.description: Monitor the health of your servers, look at latency trends over time, and better understand the threat landscape, all in one place.

icon.description: Orange icon of robot and a chart

features.title: Cloudflare Logs
features.description: Get detailed logs of your HTTP requests. Use these logs to debug, identify configuration adjustments to improve performance and security, and create custom analytics. Combine request logs with other data sources, such as game server logs, for end-to-end visibility.

features.title: Cloudflare Radar
features.description: Get Internet insights, threats and trends based on aggregated Cloudflare network data.

features.title: Web Analytics
features.description: Get analytics for your website without invading your players' privacy. Cloudflare web analytics provides data such as hostnames, URLs or countries  without the use of cookies or "fingerprinting". Investigate spikes in traffic by zooming into the relevant time range with a simple click.

relatedBlades.title: Build your game with serverless development
relatedBlades.copy:
Building, scaling, and maintaining infrastructure to protect and accelerate your game platform can be time- and cost-prohibitive.

Cloudflare's serverless development platform lets you augment existing applications (e.g. user authentication and authorization mechanisms), add new game features (e.g. bespoke matchmaking), or build entirely new games. 

[Cloudflare Workers](https://workers.cloudflare.com/) provides a serverless JavaScript and WASM execution environment that enables you to:

- Quickly build applications without configuring or maintaining servers or containers
- Easily scale to support spikes in demand
- Run application logic within milliseconds of your users

image.description: Illustration of globe surrounded by code

relatedBlades.quote: "Before Spectrum, we had to rely on unstable services & techniques that increased latency, worsening user's experience. Now, we're able to be continually protected without added latency, which makes it the best option for any latency & uptime sensitive service such as online gaming."

quoteCarousel.quote: "We wanted to ensure we have a high-quality Cloudflare level of protection to protect our critical communication protocol, and Cloudflare Spectrum helped us really boost the performance and resiliency of our custom TCP protocols. With other providers, it takes more than 30 seconds to a minute before scrubbing or mitigation takes place. Using Spectrum, it's much faster."

"Attacks that would otherwise make our sites slow or entirely inaccessible get blocked by Cloudflare. Because of this protection the 1,600 sites we have on Cloudflare are kept online and our community keeps coming back to enjoy them."

relatedBlades.title: Save with the Bandwidth Alliance
relatedBlades.copy: Is your game platform hosted on a public cloud host provider? You may be eligible to __significantly discounted egress fees__. The Bandwidth Alliance is a group of forward-thinking cloud and networking companies that are committed to discounting or waiving data transfer (also known as bandwidth) fees for shared customers.

relatedBlades.quote: The combination of Cloudflare and Backblaze B2 Cloud Storage saves Nodecraft almost 85% each month on data storage and egress costs versus Amazon S3.
